translations: 平衡；对重平衡；补偿；均衡化
使平衡；补偿（counterbalance 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Students must know the value of exercise because it plays a necessary part in counterbalancing the stress responses produced in our bodies by having to meet exams.
sentences.translation: 学生们必须知道锻炼的价值，因为它对平衡我们体内因面临考试而产生的压力反应起着必要的作用。

sentences.sentence: Rapid changes will provoke counterbalancing actions.
sentences.translation: 迅速的变化将会刺激抗衡行动。

sentences.sentence: Each has its own counterbalancing goals and approaches.
sentences.translation: 其各自都有着平衡互补的目标与方法。
